Articles.Content:
Is there a list of all the science objectives available, as i am not always sure what i can do where!!

For example am I missing 3 science missions on kerbin ?? i dont know.

could this be an option ingame possibly or to much of a spoiler ?

Just grey out science not completed.

Many thanks All

Edited December 22, 2013 by killavirus

The wiki has a list of all the "biomes," or separate places in which science can be collected: http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/Biomes. (Hmm, it seems to leave out "high above the sun" and "space near the sun.") Not every science instrument is useful in every biome, though. For example, the thermometer gathers no science unless you are near a world.

Many thanks, i knew about the biomes, just wondered if there was a checklist i could go through, for science done or not done

Many thanks for your time and input.
